formulas: \begin{align} a_x(t) &= 0 \\ v_x(t) &= v_{0x} = const \\ x(t) &= x_0 + v_{0x} \cdot t \end{align}
\begin{align} a_x(t) &= a_{0x} = const \\ v_x(t) &= v_{0x} + a_{0x} \cdot t \\ x(t) &= x_0 + v_{0x}t + \frac{a_{0x} \cdot t^2}{2} \end{align}
